trans-unit.source: Represents a set of line segments defined by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> with each <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> specifying the end point of a line segment.
trans-unit.target: 表示由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> 定義的一組線段，其中每個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 用於指定線段的結束點。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to create a series of connected lines in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個類別來建立一系列連接的直線中<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment> to specify points for segments of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment>指定點之線段<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A collection of points that determine the line segments of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" />.
trans-unit.target: 點集合，用於決定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> 的線段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the segment stroked; otherwise, <see langword="false" />..
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示描邊這個線段，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> class with the specified list of points that determine the line segments and a value indicating whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之決定線段的點清單和用於指示線段是否描邊的點，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> structures that defines this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定定義這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 物件之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> 結構的集合。

trans-unit.source: The shape of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment" /> 物件的形狀。

trans-unit.source: A line is drawn from the end point of the previous segment or, if this is the first segment, from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to the first point in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 從上一個區段的結束點繪製線條或，如果這是第一個區段中，從<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>此集合中的第一個點。

trans-unit.source: Lines are then drawn between each subsequent point specified in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 然後在此集合中指定每個後續點之間繪製行。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment.Points%2A> property to set the segment points of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment.Points%2A>屬性來設定的區段點<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment.Points" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.PolyLineSegment.Points" /> 相依性屬性。
